stable103/guards-end-scene.betray-rathian: Sorry, Rathian. That was never part of my plan.
stable103/guards-end-scene.conflict: I have orders, {{name}}, and I have to carry them out. Please, I don't want to do this.
stable103/guards-end-scene.conflict-fight: Too bad. I really want to do this. Bring it on.
stable103/guards-end-scene.conflict-intimidate: I know you don't, you're a pencil pusher. Now stand down, or I'll fold you like a piece of paper.
stable103/guards-end-scene.entry:
Hi, {{name}} !
The Overmare wishes to see you in her office. Please follow us.
stable103/guards-end-scene.go-with-rathian: I see. [Speak to the guards:] He stays with me. Let us go.
stable103/guards-end-scene.leave-companion-accept: Alright. Wait here, I'll be back soon.
stable103/guards-end-scene.leave-friends: I'm sorry, but your companions can't come with you. They'll have to wait here.
stable103/guards-end-scene.rathian-betrayed: So that's it then ? You're betraying me ? I traded a cell with the Golden Herd, for a cell in your Stable ?
stable103/guards-end-scene.rathian-betrayed-answer1: Rejoice, Rathian. At least, our food tastes like food.
stable103/guards-end-scene.rathian-betrayed-answer2: I could've killed you. I think you got off easy.
stable103/guards-end-scene.rathian-interjects: Hey. What are you doing ? I thought we were in this together. The controls for Sentinel are in the overmare's quarters. I'm coming with you.
stable103/guards-end-scene.refuse-to-follow-alt: Oh, I'm going to see her. Let me pass.
stable103/guards-end-scene.refuse-to-leave-friends: No. They're with me all the way. Let us through.
stable103/guards-end-scene.refused-to-follow: Afraid that's not a request, it's an order. The Overmare demands you up there, right now. I don't want things to get ugly.
stable103/guards-end-scene.tell-go-up-with-rathian: He's with me. We're all going to see the overmare. Let us through.
stable103/guards-end-scene.with-rathian:
Halt.
We've been warned the intruder was with you. We'll take him into custody, if you don't mind. The Overmare wants to see you in her office.
